N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 247.4 - Approved fuels

State Regulations
(a) A person who
operates an outdoor wood boiler may only burn the following fuels in such
outdoor wood boiler: (1)
seasoned clean
wood; (2)
wood pellets made from
clean wood; (3)
heating oil in
compliance with Subpart 225-1 of this Title, L.P. gas or natural gas may be
used as starter fuels for dual fuel-fired outdoor wood boilers; (4)
non-glossy, non-colored papers, including
newspaper, may be used only to start an outdoor wood boiler; and
(5)
other fuels approved by the department
per the certification requirements of section
247.8
of this Part. Notes
